table.name: vtiger_evvtmap
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_evvtmap` ( `evvtmapid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `state` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `postalcode` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `street` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `lat` float(10,6) NOT NULL, `lng` float(10,6) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`evvtmapid`), KEY `postalcode` (`postalcode`), KEY `city` (`city`), KEY `state` (`state`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_evvtmapdefaults
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_evvtmapdefaults` ( `uid` int(11) NOT NULL, `radius` int(11) NOT NULL, `zoom` int(11) NOT NULL, `maptype` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `location` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `mapcenter` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `tab` int(11) NOT NULL, `lastrun` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`uid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
